Method.name: %OnBeforeReport
Method.Implementation: //updated for zen reports encryption Ar 30/3/11 s sc=##super() if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s obj=##Class(questionnaire.QULCER).%OpenId(..QuesID) q $$$OK

Method.name: DisplayChildTable
Method.Implementation: s (tSC,rpt,stream)="" i '##class(%Dictionary.CompiledClass).%Exists($lb(repcls)) q "" s exe="s rpt=##class("_repcls_").%New()" x exe i rpt { s rpt.SubReport=subrep s rpt.MainReport="QReportULCER" s rpt.StripPI=1 s %request.Data("CONTEXT",1)=..CONTEXT d rpt.%ApplyURLParms() s rpt.ReportName=repname s tSC=rpt.GenerateStream(.stream,mode) } i $$$ISERR(tSC) set stream="" quit stream

Method.name: GetChildTable
Method.Implementation: n tSC, rpt, stream, exe, classDEF, propx, prop s (tSC,rpt,stream)="" i '##class(%Dictionary.CompiledClass).%Exists($lb(rep)) q "" s exe="s rpt=##class("_rep_").%New()" x exe i rpt { s %request.Data("CONTEXT",1)=..CONTEXT d rpt.%ApplyURLParms() s rpt.ReportName=repname s rpt.UseRawIOForXML=1 s tSC=rpt.GenerateStream(.stream,0) } i $$$ISERR(tSC) set stream="" quit stream

Method.name: GetHeightWidthOfAnnotation
GetHeightWidthOfBinaryStream
GetVal
Method.Implementation: n (%request, %session, obj, ItemIndex) s val="" d { ; QUESSSUserDefWindowDR i ItemIndex="QUESSSUserDefWindowDR" s val="Pressure Ulcer Risk Assessment" q ; QUESScore i ItemIndex="QUESScore" i obj s val=obj.QUESScore q ; QUESDate i ItemIndex="QUESDate" i obj s val=##Class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESDate) q ; QUESTime i ItemIndex="QUESTime" i obj s val=##Class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESTime) q ; QUESUser i ItemIndex="QUESUser" s val="" i obj,obj.QUESUserDR s val=obj.QUESUserDR.SSUSRName q ; QUESCreateDate i ItemIndex="QUESCreateDate" i obj s val=##Class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESCreateDate) q ; QUESCreateTime i ItemIndex="QUESCreateTime" i obj s val=##Class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESCreateTime) q ; QUESCreateUser i ItemIndex="QUESCreateUser" s val="" i obj,obj.QUESCreateUserDR s val=obj.QUESCreateUserDR.SSUSRName q ; QUESCopiedEpDR i ItemIndex="QUESCopiedEpDR" s val="" i obj,obj.QUESCopiedEpDR s val=obj.QUESCopiedEpDR.PAADMADMNo q ; QUESCopiedUser i ItemIndex="QUESCopiedUser" s val="" i obj,obj.QUESCopiedUserDR s val=obj.QUESCopiedUserDR.SSUSRName q ; QUESCopiedDate i ItemIndex="QUESCopiedDate" s val="" i obj s val=##Class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESCopiedDate) q ; QUESCopiedTime i ItemIndex="QUESCopiedTime" s val="" i obj s val=##Class(websys.Conversions).TimeLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESCopiedTime) q ; QUESCopiedComments i ItemIndex="QUESCopiedComments" s val="" i obj s val=obj.QUESCopiedComments q ; UserName i ItemIndex="UserName" s val=$g(%session.Data("LOGON.USERCODE")) q ; QUESStatusDR i ItemIndex="QUESStatusDR" s val="" i obj,obj.QUESStatusDR s val=obj.QUESStatusDR.NNSDesc q ; QUESReasonForCorrectionDR i ItemIndex="QUESReasonForCorrectionDR" q ; QUESReasForCorrDisplay i ItemIndex="QUESReasForCorrDisplay" s val="" i obj,obj.QUESReasonForCorrectionDR s val=obj.QUESReasonForCorrectionDR.ENTERRDesc q ; QAct i ItemIndex="QAct" s val=$s(obj:obj.QAct,1:"ERROR!") q ; QAssessDt i ItemIndex="QAssessDt" s val=##Class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml($s(obj:obj.QAssessDt,1:"ERROR!")) q ; QFrict i ItemIndex="QFrict" s val=$s(obj:obj.QFrict,1:"ERROR!") q ; QHospID i ItemIndex="QHospID" s val=$lg(##Class(web.CTHospital).GetCodeDescriptionFromId(obj.QHospID),1) q ; QMob i ItemIndex="QMob" s val=$s(obj:obj.QMob,1:"ERROR!") q ; QMoist i ItemIndex="QMoist" s val=$s(obj:obj.QMoist,1:"ERROR!") q ; QNut i ItemIndex="QNut" s val=$s(obj:obj.QNut,1:"ERROR!") q ; QPUDoc i ItemIndex="QPUDoc" s:obj val=obj.QPUDoc q ; QSensPer i ItemIndex="QSensPer" s val=$s(obj:obj.QSensPer,1:"ERROR!") q ; QTotal i ItemIndex="QTotal" s val=$s(obj:obj.QTotal,1:"ERROR!") q i ItemIndex="ID" s val="" if obj s val=obj.%Id() d:val="" ##Class(questionnaire.QULCER).LoadDefaultPatientAnswers(.obj,$g(%request.Data("PatientID",1)),50105,$g(%request.Data("EpisodeID",1))) q i ItemIndex="QUESPAAdmDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESPAAdmDR):obj.QUESPAAdmDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("EpisodeID",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESPAAdmDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="QUESPAPatMasDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESPAPatMasDR):obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("PatientID",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESPAPatMasDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="QUESOEOrdExecDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESOEOrdExecDR):obj.QUESOEOrdExecDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("OEOrdExecID",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESOEOrdExecDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="QUESMRClinicalPathWaysDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESMRClinicalPathWaysDR):obj.QUESMRClinicalPathWaysDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("MRClinicalPathWays",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESMRClinicalPathWaysDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="QUESConsultDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESConsultDR):obj.QUESConsultDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("QUESConsultDR",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESConsultDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="QUESOperRoomDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESOperRoomDR):obj.QUESOperRoomDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("OperRoomID",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESOperRoomDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="QUESTextResultDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESTextResultDR):obj.QUESTextResultDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("TextResultID",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESTextResultDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="QUESNRCarePlanIssuesDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESNRCarePlanIssuesDR):obj.QUESNRCarePlanIssuesDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("CarePlanIssueID",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESNRCarePlanIssuesDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="QUESRBAppointmentDR" s val=$s(obj&&(obj.QUESRBAppointmentDR):obj.QUESRBAppointmentDR.%Id(),1:$g(%request.Data("ApptID",1))) if (obj&&(obj.%Id()="")) {d obj.QUESRBAppointmentDRSetObjectId(val)} q i ItemIndex="GenUpdFlag" i obj s val=##class(web.SSUserDefWindow).TestGenerationUpdate("109") q i ItemIndex="ZENRepName" i obj s val=##class(web.SSUserDefWindow).ZENReportName("109") q i ItemIndex="UseZENReports" i obj s val=##class(web.SSUserDefWindow).UseZENReports("109") q i ItemIndex="QEFlag" s val=$g(%request.Data("QEFlag",1)) q i ItemIndex="ChartID" s val=$g(%request.Data("ChartID",1)) q i ItemIndex="PatientID" s val=$g(%request.Data("PatientID",1)) q i ItemIndex="EpisodeID" s val=$g(%request.Data("EpisodeID",1)) q i ItemIndex="mradm" s val=$g(%request.Data("mradm",1)) q i ItemIndex="RescID" s val=$g(%request.Data("RescID",1)) q i ItemIndex="ServID" s val=$g(%request.Data("ServID",1)) q i ItemIndex="WListID" s val=$g(%request.Data("WListID",1)) q i ItemIndex="refresh" s val=$g(%request.Data("refresh",1)) q i ItemIndex="MRDIARowId" s val=$g(%request.Data("MRDIARowId",1)) q i ItemIndex="OEORIRowId" s val=$g(%request.Data("OEORIRowId",1)) q i ItemIndex="TextResult" s val=$g(%request.Data("TextResult",1)) q i ItemIndex="TextResultID" s val=$g(%request.Data("TextResultID",1)) q i ItemIndex="OEOrdItemID" s val=$g(%request.Data("OEOrdItemID",1)) q i ItemIndex="norefresh" s val=$g(%request.Data("norefresh",1)) q i ItemIndex="PatBasedQues" s val=$g(%request.Data("PatBasedQues",1)) q i ItemIndex="PatientBanner" s val=$g(%request.Data("PatientBanner",1)) q i ItemIndex="ConsultParams" s val=$g(%request.Data("ConsultParams",1)) q i ItemIndex="MHDetentionID" s val=$g(%request.Data("MHDetentionID",1)) q i ItemIndex="MHSuspensionID" s val=$g(%request.Data("MHSuspensionID",1)) q i ItemIndex="TaskID" s val=$g(%request.Data("TaskID",1)) q i ItemIndex="qClassName" s val=$g(%request.Data("qClassName",1)) q i ItemIndex="qClassNameID" s val=$g(%request.Data("qClassNameID",1)) q i ItemIndex="ResidentID" s val=$g(%request.Data("ResidentID",1)) q i ItemIndex="ENTERRDescHidden" s val="" i obj,obj.QUESErrorReasonDR s val=obj.QUESErrorReasonDR.ENTERRDesc q i ItemIndex="GenItemsAfterUpdate" s val="" i obj s val=##Class(web.SSUserDefWindow).webGetNewCtrlDateTime("109",obj.%Id(),obj.QUESCreateDate,obj.QUESCreateTime) q i ItemIndex="QPUDoc_ID" q i ItemIndex="QHospID_ID" i obj s val=obj.QHospID q } while (0) q val

Parameter.name: REPORTMANUALEDIT
Parameter.Description: users can edit ZEN report and set this to 1 to prevent regeneration upon changing questionnaire/layout

XData.name: ReportDefinition
XData.Data: <report xmlns='http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/definition' name='QReportULCER' runonce="1" > <parameter expression="..QuesID"/> <attribute name='ReportTitle' expression='"Pressure Ulcer Risk Assessment"'/> <attribute name='timestamp' expression='$ZDATETIME($H, 2, 2)'/> <attribute name='username' expression='..Username'/> <group name='QuestionnaireData'> <attribute name='hasPatientData' expression='$s(obj.QUESPAPatMasDR:1,1:"")' /> <attribute name='patname' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName' /> <attribute name='patname2' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName2' /> <attribute name='patname3' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName3' /> <attribute name='patname4' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName4' /> <attribute name='patname5' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName5' /> <attribute name='patname6' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName6' /> <attribute name='patname7' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName7' /> <attribute name='patname8' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName8' /> <attribute name='patdob' expression='##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERDob)'/> <attribute name='patsex' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERSexDR.CTSEXDesc' /> <attribute name='patrego' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMINo' /> <attribute name='hasResidentData' expression='$s(obj.QUESFHResidentDR:1,1:"")' /> <attribute name='residentNumber' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHResidentNo' /> <attribute name='segment' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHMicroAreaDR.FHCMAAreaDR.FHCASegmentDR.FHCSDesc' /> <attribute name='area' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHMicroAreaDR.FHCMAAreaDR.FHCADesc' /> <attribute name='microArea' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHMicroAreaDR.FHCMADesc' /> <attribute name='primaryResidentName' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHPrimaryResidentDR.PAPERName' /> <attribute name='primaryResidentName2' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHPrimaryResidentDR.PAPERName2' /> <attribute name='address1' expression='$s(obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHAddress1:##class(websys.Conversions).LongTextLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHAddress1," "),1:"")' /> <attribute name='address2' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHAddress2' /> <attribute name='suburb' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHCityCodeDR.CTCITDesc' /> <attribute name='state' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHProvinceDR.PROVDesc' /> <attribute name='postcode' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHZipDR.CTZIPCode' /> <!-- layout component items--> <element field='QUESSSUserDefWindowDR' name='QUESSSUserDefWindowDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESSSUserDefWindowDR")' /> <element field='QUESScore' name='QUESScore' expression='..GetVal("QUESScore")' /> <element field='QUESDate' name='QUESDate' expression='..GetVal("QUESDate")' /> <element field='QUESTime' name='QUESTime' expression='..GetVal("QUESTime")' /> <element field='QUESUser' name='QUESUser' expression='..GetVal("QUESUser")' /> <element field='QUESCreateDate' name='QUESCreateDate' expression='..GetVal("QUESCreateDate")' /> <element field='QUESCreateTime' name='QUESCreateTime' expression='..GetVal("QUESCreateTime")' /> <element field='QUESCreateUser' name='QUESCreateUser' expression='..GetVal("QUESCreateUser")' /> <element field='QUESCopiedEpDR' name='QUESCopiedEpDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESCopiedEpDR")' /> <element field='QUESCopiedUser' name='QUESCopiedUser' expression='..GetVal("QUESCopiedUser")' /> <element field='QUESCopiedDate' name='QUESCopiedDate' expression='..GetVal("QUESCopiedDate")' /> <element field='QUESCopiedTime' name='QUESCopiedTime' expression='..GetVal("QUESCopiedTime")' /> <element field='QUESCopiedComments' name='QUESCopiedComments' expression='..GetVal("QUESCopiedComments")' /> <element field='UserName' name='UserName' expression='..GetVal("UserName")' /> <element field='QUESStatusDR' name='QUESStatusDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESStatusDR")' /> <element field='QUESReasonForCorrectionDR' name='QUESReasonForCorrectionDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESReasonForCorrectionDR")' /> <element field='QUESReasForCorrDisplay' name='QUESReasForCorrDisplay' expression='..GetVal("QUESReasForCorrDisplay")' /> <element field='QAct' name='QAct' expression='..GetVal("QAct")' /> <element field='QAssessDt' name='QAssessDt' expression='..GetVal("QAssessDt")' /> <element field='QFrict' name='QFrict' expression='..GetVal("QFrict")' /> <element field='QHospID' name='QHospID' expression='..GetVal("QHospID")' /> <element field='QMob' name='QMob' expression='..GetVal("QMob")' /> <element field='QMoist' name='QMoist' expression='..GetVal("QMoist")' /> <element field='QNut' name='QNut' expression='..GetVal("QNut")' /> <element field='QPUDocMR' name='QPUDocMR' expression='$s((","_..GetVal("QPUDoc")_",")[(",MR,"):$c(254),1:$c(111))' /> <element field='QPUDocIF' name='QPUDocIF' expression='$s((","_..GetVal("QPUDoc")_",")[(",IF,"):$c(254),1:$c(111))' /> <element field='QPUDocWC' name='QPUDocWC' expression='$s((","_..GetVal("QPUDoc")_",")[(",WC,"):$c(254),1:$c(111))' /> <element field='QSensPer' name='QSensPer' expression='..GetVal("QSensPer")' /> <element field='QTotal' name='QTotal' expression='..GetVal("QTotal")' /> <!-- Appendix (image) items--> <!-- HIDDEN component items--> <element field='ID' name='ID' expression='..GetVal("ID")' /> <element field='QUESPAAdmDR' name='QUESPAAdmDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESPAAdmDR")' /> <element field='QUESPAPatMasDR' name='QUESPAPatMasDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESPAPatMasDR")' /> <element field='QUESOEOrdExecDR' name='QUESOEOrdExecDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESOEOrdExecDR")' /> <element field='QUESMRClinicalPathWaysDR' name='QUESMRClinicalPathWaysDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESMRClinicalPathWaysDR")' /> <element field='QUESConsultDR' name='QUESConsultDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESConsultDR")' /> <element field='QUESOperRoomDR' name='QUESOperRoomDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESOperRoomDR")' /> <element field='QUESTextResultDR' name='QUESTextResultDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESTextResultDR")' /> <element field='QUESNRCarePlanIssuesDR' name='QUESNRCarePlanIssuesDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESNRCarePlanIssuesDR")' /> <element field='QUESRBAppointmentDR' name='QUESRBAppointmentDR' expression='..GetVal("QUESRBAppointmentDR")' /> <element field='GenUpdFlag' name='GenUpdFlag' expression='..GetVal("GenUpdFlag")' /> <element field='ZENRepName' name='ZENRepName' expression='..GetVal("ZENRepName")' /> <element field='UseZENReports' name='UseZENReports' expression='..GetVal("UseZENReports")' /> <element field='QEFlag' name='QEFlag' expression='..GetVal("QEFlag")' /> <element field='ChartID' name='ChartID' expression='..GetVal("ChartID")' /> <element field='PatientID' name='PatientID' expression='..GetVal("PatientID")' /> <element field='EpisodeID' name='EpisodeID' expression='..GetVal("EpisodeID")' /> <element field='mradm' name='mradm' expression='..GetVal("mradm")' /> <element field='RescID' name='RescID' expression='..GetVal("RescID")' /> <element field='ServID' name='ServID' expression='..GetVal("ServID")' /> <element field='WListID' name='WListID' expression='..GetVal("WListID")' /> <element field='refresh' name='refresh' expression='..GetVal("refresh")' /> <element field='MRDIARowId' name='MRDIARowId' expression='..GetVal("MRDIARowId")' /> <element field='OEORIRowId' name='OEORIRowId' expression='..GetVal("OEORIRowId")' /> <element field='TextResult' name='TextResult' expression='..GetVal("TextResult")' /> <element field='TextResultID' name='TextResultID' expression='..GetVal("TextResultID")' /> <element field='OEOrdItemID' name='OEOrdItemID' expression='..GetVal("OEOrdItemID")' /> <element field='norefresh' name='norefresh' expression='..GetVal("norefresh")' /> <element field='PatBasedQues' name='PatBasedQues' expression='..GetVal("PatBasedQues")' /> <element field='PatientBanner' name='PatientBanner' expression='..GetVal("PatientBanner")' /> <element field='ConsultParams' name='ConsultParams' expression='..GetVal("ConsultParams")' /> <element field='MHDetentionID' name='MHDetentionID' expression='..GetVal("MHDetentionID")' /> <element field='MHSuspensionID' name='MHSuspensionID' expression='..GetVal("MHSuspensionID")' /> <element field='TaskID' name='TaskID' expression='..GetVal("TaskID")' /> <element field='qClassName' name='qClassName' expression='..GetVal("qClassName")' /> <element field='qClassNameID' name='qClassNameID' expression='..GetVal("qClassNameID")' /> <element field='ResidentID' name='ResidentID' expression='..GetVal("ResidentID")' /> <element field='ENTERRDescHidden' name='ENTERRDescHidden' expression='..GetVal("ENTERRDescHidden")' /> <element field='GenItemsAfterUpdate' name='GenItemsAfterUpdate' expression='..GetVal("GenItemsAfterUpdate")' /> <element field='QPUDoc_ID' name='QPUDoc_ID' expression='..GetVal("QPUDoc_ID")' /> <element field='QHospID_ID' name='QHospID_ID' expression='..GetVal("QHospID_ID")' /> </group> <!-- child table --> <call method='GetChildTableQStaging' /> </report>

XData.name: ReportDisplay
XslFoXslt
XData.Data: <zenxslt> <xsl:template name='stylealtcolor' > <xsl:param name='num'/> <xsl:if test='$num mod 2 = 0'> <xsl:attribute name='background-color'>#DDDDDD</xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="ScaleImages" > <xsl:param name="src"/> <xsl:param name="heightval"/> <xsl:param name="widthval"/> <fo:block> <fo:external-graphic> <xsl:attribute name="src"> <xsl:value-of select="$src"/> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name='position'>absolute</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name='content-height'> <xsl:value-of select="$heightval"/> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name='content-width'> <xsl:value-of select="$widthval" /> </xsl:attribute> </fo:external-graphic> </fo:block> </xsl:template> </zenxslt>
